name: unappreciated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If someone is unappreciated, other people do not recognize how good or important they are: People view nurses as working for low wages and being undervalued and unappreciated. From time to time, we all feel unappreciated in the home or the workplace.
More examplesFewer examplesA lot of people feel alone and misunderstood; they feel unacknowledged, unappreciated.One in three of us feels exhausted, unappreciated or underpaid in our jobs, according to a recent survey.Unappreciated in his lifetime, Van Gogh is now one of the world's most famous artists.
